activities:
a.	ENVIRON uses protected information related to employees in connection with the management and operation of the firm, making services and benefits available to employees and their families, and maintaining contact with current and former employees.  ENVIRON uses protected information obtained from or relating to prospective employees who send resumes or apply for employment via the firm's Web site for the purposes of making hiring decisions.
b.	ENVIRON uses Protected Information obtained from or relating to prospective and current clients and their personnel in order to provide services to such clients and to fulfill its professional obligations.
c.	To a limited extent, ENVIRON may use Protected Information related to members of the general public for the purpose of making certain information and resources available to such persons.
eucountries: Belgium, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
industrysector: Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Architectural/Construction/Eng Svc - (ACE)General Science & Technology - (GST)
personaldata: On-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources Data
